detectors.description:
SafeMath.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#24-27) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#25)

Pausable.whenNotPaused() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#218-221) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-require(bool)(! paused) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#219)

PowerCoin.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#320-327) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-deprecated (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#322)

PowerCoin.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#335-341) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-deprecated (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#336)

PowerCoin.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#349-355) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-deprecated (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#350)

PowerCoin.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#365-371) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-deprecated (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#366)

UpgradedStandardToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#287-293) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#92)
PowerCoin (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#295-425) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#92)

PowerCoin.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#344-346) ignores return value by super._approve(_spender,_value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#345)

BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#122-128) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[_to] = balances[_to].add(_value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PowerCoin.sol#125)
